step5.content: Begin by melting the butter in a large pan. Once the butter is melted, add in the onions, the bacon or in my case, my salami and the garlic. Sauté gently until the onions become soft. After about 5 minutes or so, gentle sautéing, the onion should be nice and soft. I'll turn off the heat. Add in all the remaining ingredients: the mushrooms, the breadcrumbs and the rosemary. Give it all a good mix. When everything is nicely mixed, it's ready for use!
step5.label: Baking or Cooking
step5.step_assignment_explanation: This segment covers the cooking process of the stuffing mixture, starting with melting butter and sautéing the onions and other ingredients until everything is mixed and ready for use.
